title: Most Exciting Matchups of the 2019-20 NBA Regular Season | The Mismatch
description:
The NBA just officially announced the 2019-20 regular-season schedule. Which matchups are we most looking forward to?
Hosts: Chris Vernon, Kevin O’Connor
